title: Kloves Inc. Announces Bronze Sponsorship of Fusion 15
text: Kloves Inc. Announces Bronze Sponsorship of Fusion 15 Kloves Inc. will showcase its Service Management Solutions on ServiceNow Platform. SANTA CLARA, CA, October 21,   Kloves Inc., a ServiceNow solutions partner, today announced it is going to be a Bronze sponsor of the Fusion 15 conference, where global leaders in service management will presents best practices, innovative strategies and real-world application. The conference will be held November 1 to 4 at the Hyatt Regency, New Orleans, Louisiana. At Fusion 15, Kloves Inc. is going to be at booth 721 showcasing its IT Service Management Solution with a key focus on end user experience, Self Service and automation. Real life examples will be available for the attendees, as well as customized sunglasses and instant pictures that will make the whole environment relaxed and friendly. "2015 was a great year for Kloves Inc." said Kamal Arora, Director at Kloves Inc. "We implemented many ITSM solutions and created exceptional experiences for our customers using the ServiceNow Platform. Our strength lies on the ability we have in understanding our customers' needs: we tailor the platform following precisely the requirements and the guidelines provided during the engagement, in order to allow our clients to achieve high level of efficiency and see the full potential of the platform in action." (Demos of some of these solutions are available at our app store at Kloves Inc.).About Fusion 15 Jointly hosted by industry leaders HDI and itSMF USA, the annual FUSION Conference & Expo unites IT service management's best speakers, solution providers, and networking opportunities for an unparalleled educational experience. Each year, industry professionals, experts, and vendors attend to discover the best and newest technologies, ideas, systems, and methodologies. Looking for ways to improve their IT services, attendees gain valuable business contacts and tangible tools to immediately effect change within their organizations. Learn more at http://www.servicemanagementfusion.com. Register for Fusion 15 now. About Kloves Inc. Kloves Inc. is a Silicon Valley based ServiceNow professional solution partner that enables organizations to convert business processes and strategies into realities. Based in Santa Clara, CA, it was founded in 2010, and has senior professionals located throughout the US, Canada and India. We believe in the "WOW" factor and strive to achieve it in all our engagements. Our key strengths are: Service Management Solutions, Self Service, Service Catalog and SRM. For more information, visit http://www.klovesinc.com. # # #
